name: Escape from Collapse
description:
Use your ability to create trampolines in the air to escape from the collapsing cave without hitting any obstacles or falling into the lava!

This is my first game jam game.

I hope you enjoy playing this game.

Enter your name on the left trampoline and press the right trampoline to start playing.

Drag to generate trampolines and survive as far as possible.

To survive further, take the square items to restore the number of trampolines.

Following Asset is used:

DOTween: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/dotween-hotween-v2-27676?l...

Ideas, Illustrations: https://twitter.com/create_kuri8

Programming: Hayato0227
